verbs.description: iowa district probes report of teacher in blackface at party [ARG1: an iowa school district] [V: criticized] [ARG2: for discriminating against minorities] is investigating reports that a teacher wore blackface at a public halloween party the quad - city times reports that walcott elementary teacher megan luloff wore makeup to appear to be african - american at the party friday night at the walcott american legion luloff has n't returned messages left thursday by the associated press iowa district iowa davenport iowa iowa school district conference of branches davenport school district quad - city times betty c andrews betty c andrews report teacher walcott american legion national association for the advancement of colored people walcott elementary davenport the associated press megan luloff superintendent art tate naacp
